cards.name: Absorb Vis
cards.text:
Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Academy Ruins
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.
cards.flavor: Its secrets once wrought the greatest artifice ever known. Now crabs loot the rubble to decorate their shells.

cards.name: Adarkar Valkyrie
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
{T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

cards.name: Æther Spellbomb
cards.text:
{U}, Sacrifice Æther Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Æther Spellbomb: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Release that which was never caged."
—Spellbomb inscription

cards.name: Æther Vial
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Æther Vial.
{T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Æther Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Æthersnipe
cards.text:
When Æthersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Amrou Scout
cards.text: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."

cards.name: Amrou Seekers
cards.text: Amrou Seekers can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.
cards.flavor: The paradise of Amrou Haven had become a field of cinders. Its people struggled to survive, hoping to see visions of its past in the strange storms that quickly passed.

cards.name: Angel's Grace
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
You can't lose the game this turn and your opponents can't win the game this turn. Until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

cards.name: Arcbound Ravager
cards.text:
Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Ravager.
Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

cards.name: Arcbound Stinger
cards.text:
Flying
Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

cards.name: Arcbound Wanderer
cards.text: Modular—Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

cards.name: Arcbound Worker
cards.text: Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
cards.flavor: The parts are as strong as the whole.

cards.name: Auntie's Snitch
cards.text:
Auntie's Snitch can't block.
Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
Whenever a Goblin or Rogue you control deals combat damage to a player, if Auntie's Snitch is in your graveyard, you may return Auntie's Snitch to your hand.

cards.name: Auriok Salvagers
cards.text: {1}{W}: Return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Memnarch or the vedalken salvage most of the large machines, leaving us only scraps. Scraps are enough."

cards.name: Avian Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Flying
cards.flavor: Today it flies with the flock. Tomorrow it may wake to find them gone, its body in an unfamiliar form.

cards.name: Blightspeaker
cards.text:
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: One croaked sermon spreads propaganda and plague.

cards.name: Blind-Spot Giant
cards.text: Blind-Spot Giant can't attack or block unless you control another Giant.
cards.flavor: Among the solitude-loving giantkind, teamwork is unusual. But he appreciates hearing the occasional "Swing down and to your left."

cards.name: Blinding Beam
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Tap two target creatures.
• Creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step.
Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

cards.name: Blinkmoth Nexus
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.
{1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Blood Moon
cards.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
cards.flavor: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

cards.name: Bonesplitter
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {1}
cards.flavor:
"It puts an end to what ails you."
—Jeorg, Valla battlemaster

cards.name: Bound in Silence
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor: A fight put off forever is already won.

cards.name: Bridge from Below
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

cards.name: Brute Force
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Blood, bone, and sinew are magnified, as is the rage that drives them. The brain, however, remains unchanged—a little bean, swinging by a strand in a cavernous, raving head.

cards.name: Careful Consideration
cards.text: Target player draws four cards, then discards three cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead that player draws four cards, then discards two cards.
cards.flavor:
"Sages who take the time to verify their sources are rewarded for their diligence."
—Jhoira, to Teferi

cards.name: Cenn's Enlistment
cards.text:
Put two 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
cards.flavor: The more the scarier.

cards.name: Chalice of the Void
cards.text:
Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

cards.name: Citanul Woodreaders
cards.text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.
cards.flavor: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

cards.name: City of Brass
cards.text:
Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"There is much to learn here, but few can endure the ringing of the spires."
—Nulakam the Archivist

cards.name: Cloudgoat Ranger
cards.text:
When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Cold-Eyed Selkie
cards.text:
Islandwalk
Whenever Cold-Eyed Selkie deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards.
cards.flavor: She follows the old tributaries built when merrows still shaped the tides.

cards.name: Countryside Crusher
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your graveyard and repeat this process.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Countryside Crusher.

cards.name: Court Homunculus
cards.text: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.
cards.flavor: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

cards.name: Crush Underfoot
cards.text: Choose a Giant creature you control. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.
cards.flavor:
Five-toed grave
—Kithkin phrase meaning
"a giant's footprint"

cards.name: Cryptic Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Counter target spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Tap all creatures your opponents control.
• Draw a card.

cards.name: Dakmor Salvage
cards.text:
Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

cards.name: Dampen Thought
cards.text:
Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

cards.name: Dark Confidant
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
cards.flavor: Greatness, at any cost.

cards.name: Death Cloud
cards.text: Each player loses X life, discards X cards, sacrifices X creatures, then sacrifices X lands.
cards.flavor: The swarm's million wings stir the foulest of breezes.

cards.name: Death Denied
cards.text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

cards.name: Death Rattle
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Destroy target nongreen creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Deepcavern Imp
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Echo—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

cards.name: Demigod of Revenge
cards.text:
Flying, haste
When you cast Demigod of Revenge, return all cards named Demigod of Revenge from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"His laugh, a bellowing, deathly din, slices through the heavens, making them bleed."
—The Seer's Parables

cards.name: Desperate Ritual
cards.text:
Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

cards.name: Dispeller's Capsule
cards.text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"I find its symmetry pleasing. It rids our world of offensive refuse while disposing of itself."
—Dolomarus, Proctor of the Clean

cards.name: Divinity of Pride
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
Divinity of Pride gets +4/+4 as long as you have 25 or more life.
cards.flavor:
"She spoke of mystery and portent, of such unfathomable things that my mind screamed for pity."
—The Seer's Parables

cards.name: Doubling Season
cards.text:
If an effect would put one or more tokens onto the battlefield under your control, it puts twice that many of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.
If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

cards.name: Drag Down
cards.text: Domain — Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: The barbarians of Jund believe the bottomless tar pits extend forever into other, darker worlds.

cards.name: Dragonstorm
cards.text:
Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

cards.name: Dreamspoiler Witches
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: At night, the faeries steal dreamstuff for their queen. At daybreak, countless creatures wake weak and hollow.

cards.name: Durkwood Baloth
cards.text: Suspend 5—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Earwig Squad
cards.text:
Prowl {2}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
When Earwig Squad enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, search target opponent's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Echoing Courage
cards.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

cards.name: Echoing Truth
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

cards.name: Electrolyze
cards.text:
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

cards.name: Elspeth, Knight-Errant
cards.text:
+1: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.
+1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
−8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

cards.name: Empty the Warrens
cards.text:
Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
cards.flavor:
"They'd pour out of the warrens to make war (and to make room for the littering matrons)."
—Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

cards.name: Engineered Explosives
cards.text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{2}, Sacrifice Engineered Explosives: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Engineered Explosives.

cards.name: Epochrasite
cards.text:
Epochrasite enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand.
When Epochrasite dies, exile it with three time counters on it and it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast this card without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Errant Ephemeron
cards.text:
Flying
Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Erratic Mutation
cards.text: Choose target creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. That creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. Put all cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Esperzoa
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

cards.name: Etched Oracle
cards.text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{1}, Remove four +1/+1 counters from Etched Oracle: Target player draws three cards.

cards.name: Eternal Witness
cards.text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

cards.name: Etherium Sculptor
cards.text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

cards.name: Ethersworn Canonist
cards.text: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.
cards.flavor: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

cards.name: Executioner's Capsule
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.
cards.flavor: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

cards.name: Extirpate
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Facevaulter
cards.text: {B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Facevaulter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Boggarts get so excited when they find something new to smash that they really don't notice who gets underfoot.

cards.name: Faerie Macabre
cards.text:
Flying
Discard Faerie Macabre: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.
cards.flavor: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

cards.name: Faerie Mechanist
cards.text:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Festering Goblin
cards.text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

cards.name: Feudkiller's Verdict
cards.text: You gain 10 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, put a 5/5 white Giant Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"There are all kinds of strengths, but if you have strength of soul, the others will follow."
—Galanda Feudkiller

cards.name: Fiery Fall
cards.text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
cards.flavor: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

cards.name: Figure of Destiny
cards.text:
{R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

cards.name: Flickerwisp
cards.text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Its wings disturb more than air.

cards.name: Frogmite
cards.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
cards.flavor: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

cards.name: Fury Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card.

cards.name: Giant Dustwasp
cards.text:
Flying
Suspend 4—{1}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Gifts Ungiven
cards.text: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Glacial Ray
cards.text:
Glacial Ray deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

cards.name: Gleam of Resistance
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.
Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Glen Elendra Archmage
cards.text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Glen Elendra Archmage: Counter target noncreature spell.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Glimmervoid
cards.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if you control no artifacts, sacrifice Glimmervoid.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: An empty canvas holds infinite possibilities.

cards.name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV
cards.text:
White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.
cards.flavor: The Arbiter is a conduit of justice, a will so disciplined that it dispenses justice without ego or remorse.

cards.name: Grapeshot
cards.text:
Grapeshot deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
cards.flavor: Mages often seek to emulate the powerful relics lost to time and apocalypse.

cards.name: Greater Gargadon
cards.text:
Suspend 10—{R}
Sacrifice an artifact, creature, or land: Remove a time counter from Greater Gargadon. Activate this ability only if Greater Gargadon is suspended.

cards.name: Greater Mossdog
cards.text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Man's best fungus.

cards.name: Grinning Ignus
cards.text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {2}{R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor:
"Take care what you offer the ignus. Food, perhaps. Coins. But nothing flammable!"
—Stovic, village eccentric

cards.name: Hammerheim Deadeye
cards.text:
Echo {5}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Hammerheim Deadeye enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with flying.

cards.name: Hana Kami
cards.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Hana Kami: Return target Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: It grew in lands lit by pride and watered by tears.

cards.name: Hillcomber Giant
cards.text: Mountainwalk
cards.flavor: The giants believe the fossils they find in Lorwyn's rocky heights are dreams frozen in time, and they treasure them.

cards.name: Horobi's Whisper
cards.text:
If you control a Swamp, destroy target nonblack creature.
Splice onto Arcane—Exile four cards from your graveyard. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

cards.name: Imperiosaur
cards.text: Spend only mana produced by basic lands to cast Imperiosaur.
cards.flavor:
"An ancient, powerful force has overtaken the valley. I sympathize for its former inhabitants, but I rejoice for the land itself."
—Olanti, Muraganda druid

cards.name: Incremental Growth
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Tie a mouse under a bridge, and your cabbages will triple in size."
—Kithkin superstition

cards.name: Ivory Giant
cards.text:
When Ivory Giant enters the battlefield, tap all nonwhite creatures.
Suspend 5—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Jhoira of the Ghitu
cards.text: {2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

cards.name: Jugan, the Rising Star
cards.text:
Flying
When Jugan, the Rising Star dies, you may distribute five +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.

cards.name: Kataki, War's Wage
cards.text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {1}."
cards.flavor:
"Before the war, we prayed to Kataki to sharpen our swords and harden our armor. Without his blessing our weapons are all but useless against the kami hordes."
—Kenzo the Hardhearted

cards.name: Keiga, the Tide Star
cards.text:
Flying
When Keiga, the Tide Star dies, gain control of target creature.

cards.name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
cards.text:
Haste
{T}: Put a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control onto the battlefield. That token has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Kira, Great Glass-Spinner
cards.text:
Flying
Creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time in a turn, counter that spell or ability."
cards.flavor: Each spell is an intricate tapestry, and Kira is the great unraveler.

cards.name: Kitchen Finks
cards.text:
When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Accept one favor from an ouphe, and you're doomed to accept another.

cards.name: Kithkin Greatheart
cards.text: As long as you control a Giant, Kithkin Greatheart gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
cards.flavor: Sometimes a curious giant singles out a "little one" to follow for a few days, never realizing the effect it will have on the little one's life.

cards.name: Knight of the Reliquary
cards.text:
Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"Knowledge of Bant's landscape and ruins is a weapon that the invaders can't comprehend."
—Elspeth

cards.name: Kodama's Reach
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"The land grows only where the kami will it."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

cards.name: Kokusho, the Evening Star
cards.text:
Flying
When Kokusho, the Evening Star dies, each opponent loses 5 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
cards.flavor: The fall of the evening star never heralds a gentle dawn.

cards.name: Krosan Grip
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

cards.name: Latchkey Faerie
cards.text:
Flying
Prowl {2}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Faerie or Rogue.)
When Latchkey Faerie enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

cards.name: Lava Spike
cards.text: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

cards.name: Life from the Loam
cards.text:
Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

cards.name: Lightning Helix
cards.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"Rage is not the answer. Rage followed by fitting vengeance is the answer."
—Ajani

cards.name: Logic Knot
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

cards.name: Lotus Bloom
cards.text:
Suspend 3—{0} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {0} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
{T}, Sacrifice Lotus Bloom: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Mad Auntie
cards.text:
Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Regenerate another target Goblin.
cards.flavor: One part cunning, one part wise, and many, many parts demented.

cards.name: Maelstrom Pulse
cards.text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
cards.flavor: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

cards.name: Manamorphose
cards.text:
Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Master the chaotic forces of nature, and you shall master magic."
—Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

cards.name: Marsh Flitter
cards.text:
Flying
When Marsh Flitter enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Sacrifice a Goblin: Marsh Flitter has base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Masked Admirers
cards.text:
When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."

cards.name: Meadowboon
cards.text:
When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.
Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Meloku the Clouded Mirror
cards.text:
Flying
{1}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Put a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: He loved his cities in the clouds. When he traveled to the lands below, he brought many reminders of his home.

cards.name: Mind Funeral
cards.text: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until four land cards are revealed. That player puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"The soul is only as eternal as I say it is."
—Sharuum the Hegemon

cards.name: Mogg War Marshal
cards.text:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Moldervine Cloak
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

cards.name: Molten Disaster
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
If Molten Disaster was kicked, it has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Molten Disaster deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

cards.name: Mothdust Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Tap an untapped creature you control: Mothdust Changeling gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Ever seen a changeling fly into a lantern?"
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Murderous Redcap
cards.text:
When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Myr Enforcer
cards.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
cards.flavor: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

cards.name: Myr Retriever
cards.text: When Myr Retriever dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Mephidross gives up treasure easily . . . as long as you take its place.

cards.name: Nantuko Shaman
cards.text:
When Nantuko Shaman enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, draw a card.
Suspend 1—{2}{G}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G}{G} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Narcomoeba
cards.text:
Flying
When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: It was created by the Iquati as a living memory—one that objects to being forgotten.

cards.name: Oona, Queen of the Fae
cards.text:
Flying
{X}{U/B}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of his or her library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, put a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Otherworldly Journey
cards.text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor:
"The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends."
—Journal found in Numai

cards.name: Pact of Negation
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.
cards.flavor: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

cards.name: Pallid Mycoderm
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Pallid Mycoderm.
Remove three spore counters from Pallid Mycoderm: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Each creature you control that's a Fungus or a Saproling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Paradise Mantle
cards.text:
Equipped creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Equip {1}
cards.flavor:
"It contains the wisdom of generations of our people. We permit only a chosen few to don the raiment."
—Imran, Viridian elder

cards.name: Pardic Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Pardic Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Suspend 2—{R}{R}
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if Pardic Dragon is suspended, that player may put a time counter on Pardic Dragon.

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.name: Peer Through Depths
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Penumbra Spider
cards.text:
Reach
When Penumbra Spider dies, put a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.

cards.name: Peppersmoke
cards.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If you control a Faerie, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Like being trapped in a perpetual sneeze, faerie-dust poisoning is both exhilarating and agonizing.

cards.name: Perilous Research
cards.text: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.
cards.flavor: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

cards.name: Pestermite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Pestermite enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target permanent.
cards.flavor: The fae know when they're not wanted. That's precisely why they show up.

cards.name: Petals of Insight
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If you do, return Petals of Insight to its owner's hand. Otherwise, draw three cards.

cards.name: Phthisis
cards.text:
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to its power plus its toughness.
Suspend 5—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Plumeveil
cards.text:
Flash
Defender, flying
cards.flavor:
"It was vast, a great sheet of soaring wings, and equally silent. It caught us unawares and blocked our view of the kithkin stronghold."
—Grensch, merrow cutthroat

cards.name: Progenitus
cards.text:
Protection from everything
If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
cards.flavor: The Soul of the World has returned.

cards.name: Pyrite Spellbomb
cards.text:
{R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Pyrite Spellbomb deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Melt that which was never frozen."
—Spellbomb inscription

cards.name: Pyromancer's Swath
cards.text:
If an instant or sorcery source you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that creature or player instead.
At the beginning of each end step, discard your hand.

cards.name: Rathi Trapper
cards.text: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: Tangling vines, fetid murk, paralyzing poisons, and crawling dead. The swamp is nature's trap waiting to be exploited by unnatural minds.

cards.name: Raven's Crime
cards.text:
Target player discards a card.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
cards.flavor: It plucks away memories like choice bits of carrion.

cards.name: Reach of Branches
cards.text:
Put a 2/5 green Treefolk Shaman creature token onto the battlefield.
Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Reach of Branches from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Growth has no limits.

cards.name: Reach Through Mists
cards.text: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Know one part of the name, obsession begins. Know two parts, paranoia sets in. Know three parts, madness descends. Know all, and only the kami know what will become of you."
—Lady Azami

cards.name: Relic of Progenitus
cards.text:
{T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard.
{1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.

cards.name: Reveillark
cards.text:
Flying
When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Rift Bolt
cards.text:
Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Rift Elemental
cards.text: {1}{R}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control or suspended card you own: Rift Elemental gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"It's difficult to heal a rift after it begins wandering about on its own."
—Teferi

cards.name: Riftsweeper
cards.text: When Riftsweeper enters the battlefield, choose target face-up exiled card. Its owner shuffles it into his or her library.
cards.flavor: "Beings of the rifts are not natural. No longer will these abominations tread upon the body of Gaea."

cards.name: Riftwing Cloudskate
cards.text:
Flying
When Riftwing Cloudskate enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Suspend 3—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Rude Awakening
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Untap all lands you control.
• Until end of turn, lands you control become 2/2 creatures that are still lands.
Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

cards.name: Runed Stalactite
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is every creature type.
Equip {2}
cards.flavor: When a changeling adopts a form no other changeling has taken, a rune appears in the caverns of Velis Vel to mark the event.

cards.name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
cards.text:
Flying
When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.

cards.name: Saltfield Recluse
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: He remembers a past of light and healing. But he lives the bitter present—parching salt, scouring wind, and the withering heat of the desert.

cards.name: Sanctum Gargoyle
cards.text:
Flying
When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

cards.name: Sandsower
cards.text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: It drifts through the streets as a breeze of collective sighs, wilting the bustle with dreams and heavy eyelids.

cards.name: Sarkhan Vol
cards.text:
+1: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
−2: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
−6: Put five 4/4 red Dragon creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Scion of Oona
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other Faeries you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Search for Tomorrow
cards.text:
Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Shrapnel Blast
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Shrapnel Blast, sacrifice an artifact.
Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: From trinket to trauma.

cards.name: Skeletal Vampire
cards.text:
Flying
When Skeletal Vampire enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
{3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Put two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.

cards.name: Skyreach Manta
cards.text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Flying
cards.flavor: As the dawns break, the manta soars.

cards.name: Slaughter Pact
cards.text:
Destroy target nonblack creature.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.
cards.flavor: Death is only the beginning of the end.

cards.name: Spell Snare
cards.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 2.
cards.flavor: Every culture has its unlucky numbers. In a city where you're either alone, in a crowd, or being stabbed in the back, two is the worst number of all.

cards.name: Spellstutter Sprite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

cards.name: Sporesower Thallid
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on each Fungus you control.
Remove three spore counters from Sporesower Thallid: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Sporoloth Ancient
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Sporoloth Ancient.
Creatures you control have "Remove two spore counters from this creature: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield."

cards.name: Squee, Goblin Nabob
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"Some goblins are expendable. Some are impossible to get rid of. But he's both—at the same time!"
—Starke

cards.name: Stingscourger
cards.text:
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Stingscourger enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Stinkdrinker Daredevil
cards.text: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.

cards.name: Stinkweed Imp
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

cards.name: Stir the Pride
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life."
Entwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

cards.name: Stonehewer Giant
cards.text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

cards.name: Street Wraith
cards.text:
Swampwalk
Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

cards.name: Sudden Shock
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.

cards.name: Summoner's Pact
cards.text:
Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

cards.name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Sword of Light and Shadow
Sylvan Bounty
cards.text:
Target player gains 8 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
cards.flavor: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

cards.name: Syphon Life
cards.text:
Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
cards.flavor: Leeches never tire of feeding.

cards.name: Take Possession
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Enchant permanent
You control enchanted permanent.

cards.name: Tar Pitcher
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

cards.name: Tarmogoyf
cards.text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
cards.flavor: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

cards.name: Terashi's Grasp
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within."
—Noboru, master kitemaker

cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

cards.name: Test of Faith
cards.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
cards.flavor: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

cards.name: Thallid
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid.
Remove three spore counters from Thallid: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Thallid Germinator
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Germinator.
Remove three spore counters from Thallid Germinator: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Thallid Shell-Dweller
cards.text:
Defender
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Shell-Dweller.
Remove three spore counters from Thallid Shell-Dweller: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Thieving Sprite
cards.text:
Flying
When Thieving Sprite enters the battlefield, target player reveals X cards from his or her hand, where X is the number of Faeries you control. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Thirst for Knowledge
cards.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
cards.flavor: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."

cards.name: Thundercloud Shaman
cards.text: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.
cards.flavor: He cares not for the disasters his storm brings as long as his path ahead is clear.

cards.name: Thundering Giant
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

cards.name: Tidehollow Sculler
cards.text:
When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Tombstalker
cards.text:
Flying
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

cards.name: Tooth and Nail
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Search your library for up to two creature cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
• Put up to two creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

cards.name: Torrent of Stone
cards.text:
Torrent of Stone deals 4 damage to target creature.
Splice onto Arcane—Sacrifice two Mountains. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

cards.name: Traumatic Visions
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Tribal Flames
cards.text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
cards.flavor:
"Fire is the universal language."
—Jhoira, master artificer

cards.name: Tromp the Domains
cards.text: Domain — Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: Ground into the footprints of the ravaging herd were clumps of salt from Benalia, moss from Llanowar, dust from Hurloon, and ash from as far as Urborg.

cards.name: Trygon Predator
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
cards.flavor: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.

cards.name: Vedalken Dismisser
cards.text: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market."
—Sirislav, Dimir spy

cards.name: Vedalken Shackles
cards.text:
You may choose not to untap Vedalken Shackles during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control for as long as Vedalken Shackles remains tapped.

cards.name: Vendilion Clique
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

cards.name: Verdeloth the Ancient
cards.text:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Saproling creatures and other Treefolk creatures get +1/+1.
When Verdeloth the Ancient enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Veteran Armorer
cards.text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.
cards.flavor: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."

cards.name: Vivid Crag
cards.text:
Vivid Crag enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Creek
cards.text:
Vivid Creek enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Creek: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Grove
cards.text:
Vivid Grove enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Grove: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Marsh
cards.text:
Vivid Marsh enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Marsh: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Meadow
cards.text:
Vivid Meadow enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Meadow: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Walker of the Grove
cards.text:
When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, put a 4/4 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.
Evoke {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: War-Spike Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{R}: War-Spike Changeling gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Aren't there boggarts enough in Lorwyn? Couldn't it turn into a sheep? Or a sunflower?"
—Olly of Goldmeadow

cards.name: Warren Pilferers
cards.text: When Warren Pilferers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card is a Goblin card, Warren Pilferers gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "What do they need all this stuff for? They're dead. We're alive. Simple enough."

cards.name: Warren Weirding
cards.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. If a Goblin is sacrificed this way, that player puts two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield, and those tokens gain haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"And that's when it was discovered that boggarts have just half a brain."
—The Book of Other Folk

cards.name: Woodfall Primus
cards.text:
Trample
When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Worm Harvest
cards.text:
Put a 1/1 black and green Worm creature token onto the battlefield for each land card in your graveyard.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

cards.name: Yosei, the Morning Star
cards.text:
Flying
When Yosei, the Morning Star dies, target player skips his or her next untap step. Tap up to five target permanents that player controls.
